text: What can I say about Gennaro Contaldo well he's my mentor my London dad he is
incredible he's a force of nature and he's a great great cook there not much he
doesn't know about food
I remember when he was at the
age of fourteen fifteen
maybe sixteen
he came to me he wanted to learn how to cook Italian and
I showed him everything I knew
myself
then together
we cooked
fantastic dish. The guy is crazy but he is
brilliant the food he is going to focusing on is
really great rustic simple Italian food
memory back
I'm not joking
I remember my mum when she used to do this

on a sunday lunch lots of memories lots
of nostalgia
and he's filmed all of his videos so far for food tube in his home town of
Minori where he was born
you can see I was born in a small village
where the sea was my swimming pool
the mountains was my back garden
and the village was my playground also was a market place where I could buy
fantastic fresh ingredients
what is about my cooking
fresh, pure, natural, seasonable
come on smell it look at the way the
fish all happy
with a smile minimum ingredient maximum flavour
its crying out for the pasta
come on
sometimes he goes crazy
and you might not understand a word he's saying but it doesn't matter because
it's all happening on a plate and with the hands and that's what i love about food
is you do not need language you just watch what they are doing
come on
look at that
he is brilliant
you cannot miss him
if you want to see my mentor Genaro Contaldo doing
